member.name: P:ComparativeUtil.Properties.Resources.AssembleHelp
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to Usage: ComparativeUtil.exe [options] <ReferenceGenome> <Reads> Description: Assembles the given reads using comparative assembly.
Options:
-scaffold Run scaffolding(Step 5) after fourth step. (short form /s)
-kmerlength:<int> Sets kmer length. (short form /k)
-MumLength:<int> Minimum length of MUM(short form /m)
-help Print the help informa [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:ComparativeUtil.Properties.Resources.ComparativeSplashScreen
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Comparative Utility v1.0 Copyright (c) 2011, The Outercurve Foundation. .

member.name: P:ComparativeUtil.Properties.Resources.OutPutWrittenToFileSpecified
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Output written to the specified file..
